FuncDef: The mget command transfers multiple files from the remote server to local device. The mget command transfers multiple files from the remote server to local device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the multiple remote files, which are to be copied to local device.
This parameter contains more than one file name separated by blank space. The file name can contain wild card characters.
Remote file name is a string data type. The string length range is from 1 to 256 characters.

ExtraInfo: This command cannot be used to download the entire directory and all files in its subdirectories. To download the entire directory, you can compress the directory into a .tar file for transfer.The system prompts a confirmation message to the user before file transfer. You can disable the prompt message using the undo prompt command.If the file exists in the local device, the system asks the user whether to overwrite the local file.
